attributes.action: To call for the RESIGNATION or SACKING of the UK Home Secretary -- AMBER RUDD.
attributes.additional_details: THIS MOTION IS TO  CALL FOR THE IMMEDIATE SACKING (OR RESIGNATION)  OF AMBER RUDD -- before she does ANY FURTHER DAMAGE to the UK.  Also, for these 'so called migrants' to undergo X-rays, Facial Recognition Software and/or dental checks -to verify their ages. All over 18 years-of-age MUST BE SENT BACK.
attributes.background: The UK Home Secretary, Amber Rudd has allowed into the UK  so-called 'Migrant Unaccompanied Children' from the camp in Calais. It is clear that these are no "children" -- but grown adult males and facial recognition software identified most of them as between 20 -- 38 years of age.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/169664
